---
title: "Plotting Basics"
---

Load the xts package and some sample data
```{r}
library(xts)

data(sample_matrix)
sample.xts <- as.xts(sample_matrix)
```

Create a basic plot
```{r fig.keep='last'}
plot(sample.xts[,4])
```
